{{Lang|'''Yae Miko'''|ja={{Rubi|八|や|重|え|神|み|子|こ}}|ja_rm=Yae Miko}}, also known as {{Lang|'''Guuji Yae'''|ja={{rubi|宮|ぐう|司|じ}}|ja_rm=Guuji}} or the '''Guuji''', is a playable [[Electro]] character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Miko oversees the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] and is the owner of the [[Yae Publishing House]].
